name: the helpless feeling that comes with no choice
name_original: the helpless feeling that comes with no choice
description:
hello! this project as it exists as of now is something i made for my class this summer, but i am hoping to develop it into a longer rpg with a team of friends in the future. this is just a sample of what i hope will eventually be an interesting and more detailed personal project!

trigger warnings: death, abusive relationships
